title: Geometry: Open World
description: Geometry: Open World is a fast-paced 2D action game where players control a ship navigating through treacherous obstacles, battling a variety of enemies, and ultimately facing off against formidable bosses. The gameâ€™s dynamic and vibrant open world, combined with strategic upgrades and powerful abilities, allows you to chart your course to victory! Can you defeat the bosses, conquer the obstacles, and become the best player in this open-world geometry action game?
